short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview Your LinkedIn posts into Notion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preview and perfect your LinkedIn posts directly from Notion.

Scheduled helps you plan, preview, and publish LinkedIn posts directly from Notion. It’s great for solopreneurs, ghostwriters, and social media teams.

This free extension shows you how your posts will look before they go live.

🔘 Why use it?

> See how your post will look
Preview text, images, and more without leaving Notion.

> Stay within LinkedIn’s limits
A live character counter helps you avoid going over.

> Check your hook
Make sure your opening lines grab attention on mobile and desktop.

🔘 How it works

1. Install the extension — it’s free.
2. Sign up with your email to get your extension key.
3. Write your LinkedIn posts in Notion and see live previews as you go.

🔘 What you can do

- Preview posts with text, images, videos, and carousels.
- Switch between mobile and desktop views.
- See how LinkedIn’s “see more” button will cut your text.
- Track the character count as you write.

🔘 Need help?

Got questions? Reach out to us anytime — we’re happy to help.

🔘 Privacy

To use this extension, you’ll need to sign up with your email and get an extension key. Your data is safe with us.

-

This extension makes it easy to create LinkedIn posts without leaving Notion. Try it for free today!
